author: joe@techforge.pub
description:
According to the Financial Times [paywall], older car companies are struggling to produce in-vehicle software that is as reliable as that found in cans from newer companies like China’s BYD. Although stacks such as Toyota’s Arene can be updated OTA (over the air), one developer quoted in the FT article described Arene as “full of […]

The post Carmaker devs struggle to avoid crashes appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Carmaker devs struggle to avoid crashes
